headers.Content-Security-Policy: default-src 'self' https://*.vercel.app https://*.supabase.co; script-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline' 'unsafe-eval' https://vercel.live; style-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline' https://fonts.googleapis.com; font-src 'self' https://fonts.gstatic.com; frame-src 'self' https://vercel.live; img-src 'self' data: blob: https:; connect-src 'self' https://*.supabase.co https://vercel.live wss://*.vercel.app
